text:
Blessing and honour

and glory be Thine,

And glory be Thine,

And glory be Thine
Blessing and honour

and glory be Thine,

For Thou art on the throne.

Praise Him, praise Him,
All ye saints adore Him
Praise Him praise Him
For He is on the

Throne - Hallelujah!
Blessing and honour
and glory be Thine,

And glory be Thine,

And glory be Thine,
Blessing and honour
and glory be Thine,

For Thou art on the throne.
